itemLabel: Fergus Morton, Baron Morton of Henryton

wikipedia_page.main: Fergus Dunlop Morton, Baron Morton of Henryton, MC, PC (17 October 1887 – 18 July 1973) was a British judge who was a Lord of Appeal in Ordinary from 1947 to 1959.
